function.name: imap_get_quota
function.description: Returns the quota set to the mailbox account qroot.

function.name: imap_get_quotaroot
function.description: Retrieve the quota settings per user.

function.name: imap_getacl
function.description: Gets the ACL for a given mailbox.

function.name: imap_createmailbox
function.description: Create a new mailbox.

function.name: imap_binary
function.description: Convert an 8bit string to a base64 string.

function.name: imap_headerinfo
function.description: Read the headers of the message.

function.name: imap_lsub
function.description: Return a list of subscribed mailboxes.

function.name: imap_rfc822_parse_adrlist
function.description: Parses an address string.

function.name: imap_msgno
function.description: Get the sequence number associated with a UID.

function.name: imap_subscribe
function.description: Subscribe to a mailbox.

function.name: imap_fetchheader
function.description: Get the full unfiltered header for a message.

function.name: imap_utf8
function.description: Convert a string to UTF-8.

function.name: imap_list
function.description: Read the list of mailboxes.

function.name: imap_fetch_overview
function.description: Read an overview of the information in the headers of the given message sequence.

function.name: imap_last_error
function.description: Returns the last error that was generated by an IMAP function. The error stack is NOT cleared after this call.

function.name: imap_errors
function.description: Returns an array of all IMAP errors generated since the last page load, or since the last imap_errors() call, whichever came last. The error stack is cleared after imap_errors() is called.

function.name: imap_8bit
function.description: Convert an 8-bit string to a quoted-printable string.

function.name: imap_sort
function.description: Sort an array of message headers, optionally including only messages that meet specified criteria.

function.name: imap_utf7_decode
function.description: Decode a modified UTF-7 string.

function.name: imap_utf7_encode
function.description: Encode a string in modified UTF-7.

function.name: imap_qprint
function.description: Convert a quoted-printable string to an 8-bit string.

function.name: imap_getmailboxes
function.description: Reads the list of mailboxes and returns a full array of objects containing name, attributes, and delimiter.

function.name: imap_body
function.description: Read the message body.

function.name: imap_expunge
function.description: Permanently delete all messages marked for deletion.

function.name: imap_rename
function.description: Rename a mailbox.

function.name: imap_undelete
function.description: Remove the delete flag from a message.

function.name: imap_fetchtext
function.description: Read the message body.

function.name: imap_reopen
function.description: Reopen an IMAP stream to a new mailbox.

function.name: imap_rfc822_write_address
function.description: Returns a properly formatted email address given the mailbox, host, and personal info.

function.name: imap_status
function.description: Get status info from a mailbox.

function.name: imap_open
function.description: Open an IMAP stream to a mailbox.

function.name: imap_clearflag_full
function.description: Clears flags on messages.

function.name: imap_num_msg
function.description: Gives the number of messages in the current mailbox.

function.name: imap_ping
function.description: Check if the IMAP stream is still active.

function.name: imap_listmailbox
function.description: Read the list of mailboxes.

function.name: imap_mime_header_decode
function.description: Decode mime header element in accordance with RFC 2047 and return array of objects containing 'charset' encoding and decoded 'text'.

function.name: imap_getsubscribed
function.description: Return a list of subscribed mailboxes, in the same format as imap_getmailboxes().

function.name: imap_listsubscribed
function.description: Return a list of subscribed mailboxes.

function.name: imap_mail_move
function.description: Move specified message to a mailbox.

function.name: imap_header
function.description: Read the headers of the message.

function.name: imap_mail_copy
function.description: Copy specified message to a mailbox.

function.name: imap_base64
function.description: Decode BASE64 encoded text.

function.name: imap_num_recent
function.description: Gives the number of recent messages in current mailbox.

function.name: imap_check
function.description: Get mailbox properties.

function.name: imap_append
function.description: Append a new message to a specified mailbox.

function.name: imap_thread
function.description: Return threaded by REFERENCES tree.

function.name: imap_renamemailbox
function.description: Rename a mailbox.

function.name: imap_search
function.description: Return a list of messages matching the given criteria.

function.name: imap_bodystruct
function.description: Read the structure of a specified body section of a specific message.

function.name: imap_fetchstructure
function.description: Read the full structure of a message.

function.name: imap_fetchbody
function.description: Get a specific body section.

function.name: imap_mail_compose
function.description: Create a MIME message based on given envelope and body sections.

function.name: imap_alerts
function.description: Returns an array of all IMAP alerts that have been generated since the last page load or since the last imap_alerts() call, whichever came last. The alert stack is cleared after imap_alerts() is called.

function.name: imap_close
function.description: Close an IMAP stream.

function.name: imap_unsubscribe
function.description: Unsubscribe from a mailbox.

function.name: imap_scan
function.description: Read list of mailboxes containing a certain string.

function.name: imap_mail
function.description: Send an email message.

function.name: imap_headers
function.description: Returns headers for all messages in a mailbox.

function.name: imap_setacl
function.description: Sets the ACL for a giving mailbox.

function.name: imap_set_quota
function.description: Will set the quota for qroot mailbox.

function.name: imap_create
function.description: Create a new mailbox.

function.name: imap_mailboxmsginfo
function.description: Returns info about the current mailbox.

function.name: imap_rfc822_parse_headers
function.description: Parse a set of mail headers contained in a string, and return an object similar to imap_headerinfo().

function.name: imap_setflag_full
function.description: Sets flags on messages.

function.name: imap_deletemailbox
function.description: Delete a mailbox.

function.name: imap_uid
function.description: Get the unique message id associated with a standard sequential message number.

function.name: imap_delete
function.description: Mark a message for deletion.

function.name: imap_scanmailbox
function.description: Read the list of mailboxes, takes a string to search for in the text of the mailbox.

function.name: imap_timeout
function.description: Set or fetch imap timeout.
